ygData.subject: Re: Rune I and magic armor
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe the only benefit of it being magic, in our case, is that it is lighter. Qorona of the Volition Guild, 19th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule ... tim
ygData.messageBody:
i believe the only benefit of it being magic, in our case, is that it is
lighter.

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 19th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 03:10 PM 5/24/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: osmosis <osmosis@...>
>
>Yes carry a supply. Also, magic armour : I have woven armour, only one
>more ac than cloth and its magic as well. I would like to hear about the
>benefits of magic over cloth as well. I suspect that this armour may effect
>your magic resistance, though I have not checked stats to verify this...
>try removing your armour, study your stats, and put it back on and see
>which stats are effected if not only ac.
>
-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
